SEARCH
Package com.juls.accesskeymanager.web.controllers

Class WebController

java.lang.Object
com.juls.accesskeymanager.web.controllers.WebController
@Controller @RequestMapping("/public") public class WebController extends Object
Controller class for handling web-related operations such as user registration, verification, password reset, and related functionalities.

This controller integrates with services for user management and publishes events for registration and verification processes.

      @PostMapping("/registeruser") public String addUser(@ModelAttribute AuthenticationRequest authenticationRequest, org.springframework.ui.Model model, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Registers a new user with the provided authentication request details.
      Parameters:
      authenticationRequest - the user authentication details.
      model - the model to pass attributes to the view.
      request - the HTTP request object.
      Returns:
      a redirect URL based on the registration result.

    • resetPassword

      @PostMapping("/reset") public String resetPassword(@RequestParam String email, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, org.springframework.ui.Model model) throws NotFoundException
      Initiates the password reset process for the specified email.
      Parameters:
      email - the email address of the user.
      request - the HTTP request object.
      model - the model to pass attributes to the view.
      Returns:
      the view name based on the reset process result.
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - if the user is not found.
